properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 9:02PM CST until January 27 at 5:08PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...

Ohio River at Shawneetown...Paducah...Olmsted Lock and Dam...and Cairo

.The Ohio River has crested at many locations with all of our current
warned river points falling below flood stage from Friday through Monday
of next week.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam
* until Monday afternoon.
* At  8:00 PM Tuesday the stage was 43.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 36.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 43.1 feet by
after midnight tomorrow. The river will fall below flood stage late
Monday morning.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
